title: Saudi Arabia and Its New Leadership in 2030
snippet: Those are the questions where Saudi Arabia in 2030: The Emergence of a New Leadership picks-up the story, as it provides a fresh assessment in light of recent developments, and tests several hypotheses.1 Without any pretensions of absolute certainty that the Al Sa‘ud will permanently prevail, the paper investigates the stability of the Government of Saudi Arabia under King Salman bin ‘Abdul ‘Aziz, and evaluates the most likely scenarios for Muhammad bin Salman to succeed his father, precisely to probe whether continuity may prevail.

title: The Blogs: Leaders of Saudi Arabia | William Keenan | The Times of Israel
snippet: Reign: 2015 – Present King Salman’s reign marks a decisive shift in Saudi leadership, moving power to the third generation of princes. He acted quickly to consolidate power and streamline the government decision-making process. His era has been defined by a more assertive and interventionist foreign policy.

title: Leaders 2030
snippet: To continue this journey of transformation, the Kingdom needs uncommon leaders who exemplify the values and ambitions of Vision 2030. 2030 Leaders is an exclusive world-class leadership development program that will transform exceptional senior Saudi leaders to change history and achieve our ...

title: Mohammed Bin Salman | The Visionary Leader Transforming Saudi Arabia
snippet: The Kingdom has shifted from a quiet, oil-dependent society into a nation brimming with ambition, creativity, and global influence. At the heart of this change is Crown Prince Mohammed Bin Salman, widely known as MBS. His leadership has sparked sweeping reforms, from women driving and cinemas reopening to futuristic mega-projects like NEOM and Qiddiya...
